item.title: Announcement
item.description: ðŸ“£â€‹ The GAC Dashboard just got an upgrade! Main features include better alignment for workflows and approvals with the Section 34 requirement, the rejection function returning transactions to AP coders for corrections, removal of the Change CCM option, and much more. This update will be live December 15th. To learn more about the latest improvements, check out our CAFÃ‰ session presentation<https://086gc.sharepoint.com/sites/msteams_d516a7/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fmsteams%5Fd516a7%2FShared%20Documents%2FGeneral%2FSAP%20Video%20Library%20%2D%20Vid%C3%A9oth%C3%A8que%20SAP%2FGovernment%20Acquisition%20Cards%5FCarte%20d%E2%80%99achat%20du%20gouvernement%2FFlexible%20Workflow%2FSAP%20Caf%C3%A9%20%2D%20GAC%20Optimization%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2Fmsteams%5Fd516a7%2FShared%20Documents%2FGeneral%2FSAP%20Video%20Library%20%2D%20Vid%C3%A9oth%C3%A8que%20SAP%2FGovernment%20Acquisition%20Cards%5FCarte%20d%E2%80%99achat%20du%20gouvernement%2FFlexible%20Workflow> and recording<https://086gc.sharepoint.com/sites/msteams_d516a7/_layouts/15/stream.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fmsteams_d516a7%2FShared+Documents%2FGeneral%2FSAP+Video+Library+-+Vid%C3%A9oth%C3%A8que+SAP%2FGovernment+Acquisition+Cards_Carte+d%E2%80%99achat+du+gouvernement%2FFlexible+Workflow%2FSAP+CAF%C3%89+Session+-+GAC+Improvements-20251209_180024UTC-Meeting+Recording.mp4&nav=eyJyZWZlcnJhbEluZm8iOnsicmVmZXJyYWxBcHAiOiJTdHJlYW1XZWJBcHAiLCJyZWZlcnJhbFZpZXciOiJTaGFyZURpYWxvZy1MaW5rIiwicmVmZXJyYWxBcHBQbGF0Zm9ybSI6IldlYiIsInJlZmVycmFsTW9kZSI6InZpZXcifX0%3D&startedResponseCatch=true&referrer=StreamWebApp.Web&referrerScenario=AddressBarCopied.view.87b7fe6c-ac04-4364-ab6b-87d9bda58555>.

item.title: Alert
item.description: âš ï¸â€‹ SAP will be unavailable from Friday December 5 (3:00pm ET) to Sunday December 7 (9:00pm ET) and again from Friday December 12 (3:00pm ET) to Sunday December 14 (9:00pm ET) for routine maintenance. Please plan your work accordingly.

item.title: Alert
item.description: âš ï¸â€‹ SAP sera indisponible du vendredi 5 decembre (15h00 HE) au dimanche 7 decembre (21h00 HE) et encore du vendredi 12 decembre (15h00 HE) au dimanche 14 decembre (21h00 HE) pour un entretien de routine. Veuillez planifier votre travail en consÃ©quence.
